org.apache.fop.util
Class OCAColor

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Color
      org.apache.fop.util.OCAColor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Paint, java.awt.Transparency, java.io.Serializable
public class OCAColor
extends java.awt.Color

OCAColor is a single component color representation that is mostly used in AFP documents to represent text foreground color. See also OCAColorSpace.

See Also:
Serialized Form
